Name: RADIATION EXPOSURE STATUS
Explanation: THE RADIATION EXPOSURE STATE (RES) OF A FRIENDLY UNIT BASED ON ITS PREVIOUS EXPOSURE HISTORY.

Name: RADIATION STATUS INDICATOR, LETTER
Explanation: AN INDICATION OF WHEN EMITTERS MAY BE OPERATED IN THE MARITIME ENVIRONMENT, AS DETAILED IN ATP-1 VOL. 1 TABLE 5-2.

Name: RADIATION STATUS INDICATOR DISTANCE
Explanation: AN INDICATION OF WHEN EMITTERS MAY BE OPERATED IN THE MARITIME ENVIRONMENT, WHEN CLEAR OF NEAREST FRIENDLY UNIT OR POSITION DESIGNATED. DISTANCE TO BE SPECIFIED IN MILES. I.A.W ATP-1 VOL 1 PARAGRAPH 5310 "CONSTRUCTION OF EMCON PLANS".
